page.title: 12RELIGION
page.content: {Monk Fryston Church. } It is dedicated to {St.Wilfrid}(Bishop of Ripon) and {St.Mary,}and built of locally quarried limestone.Between 1889 to 1891 the {Hemsworth}family gave money for the Church to be restored,and put in stained glass windows. { {Monk Fryston Chapel. } Methodism has been in Monk Fryston since{1808,}but the present building was not begun until 1845 with money provided by a local family called Roadhouse.The original shape was{hexagonal.}In 1875 it was too small for all the members and so a rectangular end was added.With dwindling numbers part of it has been closed off for a number of years until this year when renovations have been done.
